thread.section_title: Fireside Chimney Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fireside Chimney Supply | www.firesidechimneysupply.com
thread.title: Charles Crowell
thread.title_full: Fireside Chimney Supply reviewed by Charles Crowell

author: Charles Crowell
title: Charles Crowell
text: This company is the best. In this day and age when customer care is greatly lacking, Fireside is bucking the trend. I goofed up on my order and Bill (in sales) caught it and informed me of what I really needed. Once we got that straightened out, I had my order in 3 days. I couldn't be happier. Keep up the great work and I will recommend Fireside anytime anyone asks me where to go for chimney supplies. Their prices are very competitive also. 5 STARS
